resources.string: This Awesome App is powered by Kids Web Services (KWS), the platform that provides a set of compliance-as-a-service tools to create a kid-safe, COPPA-compliant sites and apps, allowing you to focus on delivering awesome content by abstracting all legal complexity related to data-collection.
KNOW MORE ABOUT KIDS WEB SERVICES
Kids Web Services federated identity system (Single Sign-On) allows kids and parents create one secure identity to easily log into your collection of kid-safe sites and apps.
